body: Sorry, I was unclear about this... this won't actually add a duplicate edge unless you pass "allow_duplicates" here. This will be kind of a weird test case (I don't actually expect anyone to use allow_duplicates=true along with RemoveControlEdge), but I think it will be good to at least document the behavior in this test.
